card.name: Syforce, Aurora Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your mana zone to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Ailfreet, Holy Gates Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a spell from among them, put it into your hand and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Alshia, Nova Elemental
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ulcelios, Holy Core Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever one of your other creatures that has "blocker" is destroyed, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Cyber Brain
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 3 cards.

card.name: Aquan
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: El Kaiou, Spirit Mecha King
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Milzam, Miracles Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Ultra Shield Plus—When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put up to 5 cards from the top of your deck under one of your shields. ''(Each card stack is still considered to be one shield.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Ultimus, Divine Law Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
